video.title: Unplanned America
video.synopsis: Three adventure-seeking Australians throw out their guidebooks and hunt out America's secretive and rarely seen subcultures.

episodes.synopsis: The crew ventures to Seattle and goes on patrol with a controversial vigilante group, then heads to a Southern California sex doll factory.
episodes.title: When Fantasy Meets Reality

episodes.synopsis: The boys head to Southern Illinois and meet the FBI-outlawed Juggalo family, then check out New York City's gay, black underground ballroom scene.
episodes.title: Family Matters

episodes.synopsis: The crew visits the Los Angeles set of "Austin Powers XXX: A Porn Parody," then finds themselves in a massive nude bike ride in Portland.
episodes.title: Inhibition and Exhibition

episodes.synopsis: The boys find themselves on the streets of South Chicago learning about rappers and the ghetto. Then, Pawel and Gonzo get into a graffiti war.
episodes.title: The Boyz in the Hood

episodes.synopsis: In Detroit, the boys are inspired by the pride of the locals, and in the Salton Sea, they find a community of artists, drug addicts and hippies.
episodes.title: Waking Up from the American Dream

episodes.synopsis: It's a grab bag of unplanned fun, with spring break stun guns, lassoing lessons from kids, football tailgating parties, UFO chasers and more.
episodes.title: On the Road
